mapper.sql: SYSTEMID, CTRLID, DEVICEID, DEVICETYPE, FARMLANDID, DEVICEDN, NAME
mapper.select: select DEVICEID, DEVICETYPE, NAME from DEVICE where FARMLANDID = #{farmlandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into DEVICE (SYSTEMID, CTRLID, DEVICEID, DEVICETYPE, FARMLANDID, DEVICEDN, NAME) values (#{systemid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ctrlid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{devicetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{farmlandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{devicedn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
